alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 2:40PM CDT until May 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF NORTH CENTRAL MINNESOTA AND PARTS OF NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FAR NORTH CENTRAL AND NORTHEASTERN MINNESOTA... * AFFECTED AREA...Koochiching, central and northern St. Louis, northern Cook, northern Lake and Itasca Counties. * WINDS...South 5 to 15 mph Sunday and south 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph Monday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent Sunday and as low as 20 percent Monday. * TEMPERATURES...In the low 80s both Sunday and Monday. * IMPACTS...Any fires may grow and spread quickly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning for Sunday means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur Monday. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca
